name: HORSES.IO: Horse Herd Racing
description:
HORSES.IO: The Ultimate Horse Challenge!

Saddle up and jump into horse & pony filled action! Show off your equestrian riding and jumping mastery in the field. Compete against equestrians to amass the grandest herd of horses. With deft jumping skills, soar over obstacles and fences. Strategically 'steal' horses from competitors – but remember, only with a mightier horse herd! Ride and jump through rounds to unlock horse breeds and powerups, cementing your title in the horse world.

Gather Followers

• Start with a lone animal and grow your herd, rounding up horses and ponies across vibrant landscapes.

Leap Over Obstacles and Show Riding Mastery

• Show your horse's agility and your riding skills to jump hurdles, outpace other competitors, and integrate more animals into your herd of horses.

Race and Jump to Become the Champion

• Strategize, race, and let your horse jump over challenges, gathering the largest herd of horses in each round.

Unlock Diverse Breeds

• Triumph in races to unlock new horses and pony breeds that elevate your horse collection.

Features:

Easy controls using the mouse or keyboard
Immersive gameplay with exhilarating riding and jumping challenges
Multiple fields filled with jump obstacles
Rewards for every victorious round
New breeds to tame, ride and jump

Horse and pony enthusiast? Jump into HORSES.IO, The ultimate horse challenge to ride & reign supreme in the horse jumping arena!
